name: Pinkfong Dino World
description: Discover all your favorite dinosaurs at [Pinkfong Dino World]!  From the mighty T-Rex to the giant Brachiosaurus -- watch animated videos and play fun games featuring all these dinosaurs. Learn fun facts and become a dinosaur expert at the end of the day!  [FEATURES]  1. Watch fun dinosaur videos! - Sing-along to 12 different songs with catchy tunes and fun dinosaur facts. - Watch the popular T-Rex song, Im a Chef Today, If Dinosaurs were still alive, Dinosaurs A to Z and many more!  2. Play interactive dinosaur games! - The app includes variety of interactive games featuring kids favorite dinosaurs. - Feed the T-Rex, brush Brachiosaurus teeth, and play hide-and-seek with the Triceratops.  - Dig up dinosaur fossils to discover surprises.  3. Learn dinosaur names & facts with flash cards! - Learn all about dinosaurs -- their names, diet size and origin -- with fun flash cards.  Join the adventure now to the Boom-boom-Dino World!
